The claim originated from an interview w: Scott Jensen, a physician and Republican state senator, on the Fox News program "Ingraham Angle."
Medicare does pay hospital fees for COVI: 19 cases, but it does not make standard, one-size-fits-all payments to hospitals for patients admitted with COVID-19 diagnoses and placed on ventilators.
The figures of: 13,000 and $39,000 mentioned in the claim are based on generic industry estimates for admitting and treating patients with similar conditions, rather than specific payments made by Medicare.
The meme and claim suggesting that hospi: 19 patients they admit circulated on social media, leading to the request for verification by Snopes.com.
